name: Lost on Corix T-98
description:
You are a space miner. You just woke up from cryosleep after a horrific crash and are stranded on the planet Corix T-98.

In order to return home, you need to send a distress call so someone can pick you up. Activate the miners on the planet by collecting minerals.

Keyboard layout:

WASD - Movement

E (hold) - Activate Miners/Mine minerals

Spacebar - Jump

Q - Spin

Controller:

Left thumbstick - Movement

X (hold) - Activate Miners/Mine minerals

A - Jump

Y - Spin

Main theme song:

https://soundcloud.com/linus-eldstal/corix-t-98-main-theme
